FuncDef: This command displays host lockout policy information.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a specific subscriber host lockout policy name up to 32 characters.
Specifies to display the association of the host lockout policy.
Specifies to display information for hosts in a specific lockout state. Values-all, active, graceful.
Specifies to display SAP ID information.
Specifies to display circuit ID information. The circuit-id is 256 characters maximum.
Specifies to display MAC address information up to 30 characters.
Specifies to display remote ID information up to 256 characters.
